Player.desc: Commands relating to information about the player themselves.

Player.description: Shows the requested players name history.
Shows a summary of the requested user's Minecraft profile.
Shows a 3D render of the requested user's skin.
Shows the raw skin file of the requested user.
Shows a 2D render of the requested user's Minecraft face.
Shows a 3D render of the requested user's Minecraft head.
Gives the requested user's shortened uuid.
Gives the requested user's long uuid.

Minecraft.description: Shows the recipe for that item.

Cape.desc: Commands relating to all types of capes.

Cape.description: Checks for all capes that may apply to that user and outputs all that are found.
Checks if the user has a Mojang cape e.g. Minecon capes, custom official capes, employee capes, etc.
Checks if the user has an OptiFine cape.
Checks if the user has a 5zig Reborn cape.
Checks if the user has a LabyMod cape.

Server.description: Gives a summary of the requested server.
Commands related to the Hypixel Network see `?hypixel` for more information.
Commands related to Hypixel SkyBlock see `?skyblock` for more information.

Bot.description: Shows the Top 10 most searched users on the bot.
Lets you change the server prefix for the bot.
Displays some information about the bot.
Returns how many guilds the bot is in.
Allows you to change the colour of the embed *Patreon Exclusive*
Gives an invite link to the support discord.
Gives a link to our patreon.
